titleStmt.title: SII 4.540: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 540. (A.R. No. 93 of 1892). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE VISALAKSHI-AMMAN SHRINE IN THE SECOND PRAKARA OF THE SAME TEMPLE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . cīrmaṉṉi Irunāṉkun ticaiviḷaṅkun tirumaṭaiantaiyum pormaṉṉu jayamaṭa
ntaiyum puvimaṭantaiyu maṇam puṇara Arumaṟaiy neṟivāḻa Aruntamiḻor kiḷaivāḻa poru
yntu vāḻap poṉmakuṭaṅ kavittaruḷi veṅkopak karuṅkalippakai viṭanākam meyamālai
ceṅkoluṅ koṭippuliyun tikirivaṉam paḷappa Eṇṭicaiymukat teṇkarikaḷum Eṭutta taṉikkūṭa
maṉa Aṇṭakūṭam Aḷantu muḻumatikkuṭai niṉṟa ppa pulantikiri patiṉāṉkum puvaṉaṅkaḷum vaḻipaṭa
netiyilaṅkun tikiri vaṭameruvil Irunta vempuliyeṟeṉṟu cempoṉ vīrasiṃhāsanattup
puvaṉamuḻutuṭaiyāroṭum vīṟṟiruntaruḷiya kopparakecaripaṟmarāṉa tribhuvavaṉaccakravat=tikaḷ śrīrājarāja
tevaṟku yāṇṭu 2 10 5 vatu kumbhanāyaṟṟu pūrvvapakṣattu Aṣṭamiyum veḷḷikkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Urocaṇi nā
ḷ vaṭakarai rājarājavaḷanāṭṭup pāccilUṭaiyār tirumeṟtaḷiUṭaiyanāyaṉār koyil Ātitaṇṭeśvaratevarkaṉmi
kaḷom nilavilaipramāṇa Icaivutiṭṭu Iṉṉāṭṭu vaṭavaḻiṉāṭṭut tiruppaiññili Uṭaiyanāyaṉār koyil
Ātitaṇṭeśvara tevakaṉmikaḷukku viṟṟukkuṭutta naṉcey puṉcey nilamāvatu Uṭaiyār tirumeṟtaḷi U
ṭaiyaṉāyaṉār tirunāmattukkāṇi veṅkānattam naṉcey puṉcey nilattukku Ellaiyāvatu kīḻpāṟkellai
koṉeri Ellaikku meṟkum teṉpāṟkellai ceṭṭimaṅkalamum Ulakaḷaṅkakkāṟaṉ Ellaikku vaṭakkum pāmpaṉūr
Ellaikku vaṭakkum mīpāṟkellai ciṟṟāmpū rellaikkuk kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai kuḷakkuṭi Ellaikkut teṟ
kum niccayitta nāṉkellaikkuḷpaṭṭa Ūrnattamum kuḷamum Uḷpaṭṭa naṉcey puṉcey pottakappaṭi nilam nāṉū
ṟṟu Orupattaiñce mukkāle mākāṇi Araikkāṇik kiḻEṭṭumāvum Uṭaiyār tiruppaiññiliyuṭaiyanā
yaṉār koyil Ātitaṇṭeśvaratevarkaṉmikaḷukkuk kuṭikkāṇiyāka viṟṟukkuṭuttuk koḷvatāṉa Emmilicainta
vilaippaṭi Aṉṟāṭu naṟkācu 10 1000 Ikkācu patiṉāyiramum Āvaṇakkaḷiye kāṭṭeṟṟik kaiccelavaṟakkoṇṭu viṟṟu vi
laipramāṇa Icaivu tiṭṭuk kuṭutteṉ Uṭaiyār tiruppaiññiliUṭaiyanāyaṉār koyil Ātitaṇṭeśvaratevar
kaṉmikaḷukku Uṭaiyār tirumeṟtaḷiUṭaiya nāyaṉārkoyi lātitaṇṭeśvaratevar kaṉmikaḷom Iṉṉilam nāṉūṟṟu
Orupattañce mukkāle mukkāṇi Araikkāṇik kiḻ Eṭṭumāvukkum Ikkācu patiṉā yiramume vilaiyāvutākavum Ikkā
cu patiṉāyiramum Attamaṇṭapamum tirumaṇṭapamum jirṇṇittu Irukkaiyāle taṭṭoṭu Iṭavum tirumalai tirumañca
ṉam paṇṇaveṇṭukaiyil Ittiruppaṇikku vāṅkikkuṭuttu Iṉṉilam nāṉūṟṟu Orupattañce mukkāle muk
kāṇikkāṇik kiḻeṭṭumāvukkum Ikkācu vilaiyāvutākavum Ippaṭi cammatittu viṟṟu vilaipramāṇa Icaivutiṭ
ṭuk kuṭuttom Iṉṉilattukku melṉokkiṉa maramum kiḻṉokkiṉa kiṇaṟum pākamum pākāśrayamum Uḷpaṭṭa kuṭik
kāṇiyāka viṟṟukkuṭuttom Uṭaiyār tiruppaiññiliUṭaiyaṉāyaṉār Ātitaṇṭeśvaratevar kaṉmikaḷukku Uṭaiyār
tirumeṟtaḷiUṭaiyanāyaṉār koyil Ātitaṇṭeśvaratevarkaṉmikaḷom IkkoyilkkāṇiUṭaiya civabrā
hmaṇaṉ taḻuvakkuḻaintāṉ śivalokamuṭaiyāṉ Irācarācabhaṭṭa ṉeḻuttu ... Ikkoyilkāṇiyuṭaiya civabrā
hmaṇaṉ kavuciyaṉ Āvuṭaiyāṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyā ṉeḻuttu ....
Digital edition of SII 4.540 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
